sect2.title: To start &appname;
sect2.para: Click system menu in desktop menu bar. Then select &imframework; from Preference menu. You can also launch &appname; by /usr/bin/imf-selector command from terminal emulator.

itemizedlist.listitem: Click OK button. Then the confirmation dialogue pops up. Click OK button on the dialogue.

Click Reset button. Available &imframework; list is updated to show system default configuration.

note.para: When user environment does not have $HOME/.imf file, system tries to launch &imframework; based on GTK_IM_MODULE or XMODIFIERS value on login environment. If these files and variables are not defined, the system default system configuration is used.

sect2.title: &imframework;
sect2.para: &imframework; is a software component that simplifies working with &im;. It provides cooperate function between software text edit components and &im; engines.

sect2.title: &im; engine
sect2.para: &im; engine is software component which converts combination of user inputs to specific language characters.
